name: Helium Project
tagline: Open Source Frameworks and Game Engine
body:
### Welcome to Helium Project
Helium is an open source set of cross platform C++ Frameworks, and it aspires to be a Game Engine in the near future.  It is permissively licensed under a BSD-style license.

### Stable Frameworks

[Platform](https://github.com/HeliumProject/Platform) is a simple platform abstraction layer that works on Windows, OSX, and Linux.

[Foundation](https://github.com/HeliumProject/Foundation) is a typical set of container classes, as well as interprocess communication, and some language extensions like events and delegates.

[Reflect](https://github.com/HeliumProject/Reflect) is an implementation of C++ reflection that provides metadata that automates many rote programming tasks.

[Persist](https://github.com/HeliumProject/Persist) is an implementation of object persistence that utilizes C++ reflection.  It currently supports JSON and BSON.

[Mongo](https://github.com/HeliumProject/Mongo) is an implementation of a database object model that uses C++ reflection for marshaling object data to and from mongodb's BSON format.

### Game Engine

Right now the Game Engine is under heavy development.
